all.caption: Portrait for a birthday present (Harrani and Vaamitha)

No is not the only word a person needs to say for you to understand they don’t want to be touched. People say in many different ways when they are not interested. Some may say I’m not in the mood. I’m not ready yet. etc. If you have to go out of your way to convince, lie and trick someone to be intimate with you, it is still assault. Learn your boundaries and don’t cross them. It’s as simple as that.

This statue was made to celebrate the victory of the Sri Lankan army. I wanted to depict how their victory was not a victory at all but a bunch of lies that were built on unjust deaths, kidnappings, rape and torture of innocent Tamil men, women and children. They purposely grouped tamil people into one area and slaughtered them like animals for a forced surrender. For those who lost their lives and still live with a scar mentally or physically from this massacre, I stand with you and my heart aches for you. உங்கள் தியாகங்கள் நிறைவேற நெஞ்சுருகி நிற்கின்றோம். தமிழரின் தாகம் தமிழீழத் தாயகம்.
